ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 256
ygData.msgSnippet: Whew that bites. There is nothing like the feeling of pure power you get when standing in Upper or Lower Guk, the zone to Mistmoore or any other train happy
ygData.messageBody:
Whew that bites.

There is nothing like the feeling of pure power you get when standing in
Upper or Lower Guk, the zone to Mistmoore or any other train happy place,
casting Mesmirization and seeing 16 mobs stop in their tracks. Ususally the
other players stand there dumbfounded for several seconds thinking "Woah..."
before you say "Everyone on the Glyphed." You can chain cast Mesmerization
and keep the whole train stopped until your group has mowed through them
all. It's a defining skill of the Enchanter and it really sucks IMO that
you can't do it.

[49 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work


> I must admit I'm jealous... mesmerization is completely useless on rallos
> zek.
>
> Cogg
